019    package com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.impl;
020    
021    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.Lock;
022    import com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache.Mutex;
023    import java.util.Hashtable;
024    import java.util.Map;
025    import java.util.Set;
026    import java.util.Timer;
027    import java.util.TimerTask;
028    import java.util.WeakHashMap;
029    import java.util.concurrent.Semaphore;
030    import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
031    
032    /**
033     *
034     * @author imyousuf
035     */
036    public class MutexImpl<KeyType extends Object>
037        implements Mutex<KeyType> {
038    
039        private Map<KeyType, Semaphore> lockMap;
040        private Map<Thread, Lock<KeyType>> threadLocks;
041        private Map<KeyType, Long> idleDuration;
042        private Map<KeyType, String> expirationPolicy;
043        private int concurrentPermits;
044        private long defaultWaitInMillisecond;
045        private String expiryPolicy;
046        private long expirationDuration;
047        private Timer timer;
048    
049        protected MutexImpl() {
050            idleDuration = new Hashtable<KeyType, Long>();
051            lockMap = new MonitorableMap<KeyType, Semaphore>(
052                new WeakHashMap<KeyType, Semaphore>(), new IdleTimeMapMonitor());
053            threadLocks = new WeakHashMap<Thread, Lock<KeyType>>();
054            setConcurrentPermissions(1000);
055            setDefaultWaitTimeoutInMillisecond(2000);
056            setExpiryPeriod(30000);
057            initExpirationExecutor();
058        }
059    
060        public Lock acquire(KeyType key)
061            throws InterruptedException {
062            return acquire(key, getDefaultWaitTimeoutInMillisecond());
063        }
064    
065        public int getConcurrentPermissions() {
066            return concurrentPermits;
067        }
068    
069        public void setConcurrentPermissions(int permissions) {
070            concurrentPermits = permissions;
071        }
072    
073        public Lock<KeyType> acquire(KeyType key,
074                                     long waitTimeout)
075            throws InterruptedException {
076            if (key == null) {
077                return null;
078            }
079            final int eConcurrentPermits = getConcurrentPermissions();
080            Lock eLock = null;
081            String currentExpirationPolicy = null;
082            synchronized (expiryPolicy) {
083                currentExpirationPolicy = getExpiryPolicy();
084            }
085            expirationPolicy.put(key, currentExpirationPolicy);
086            if (lockMap.containsKey(key)) {
087                boolean acquired = lockMap.get(key).tryAcquire(1,
088                    getDefaultWaitTimeoutInMillisecond(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
089                if (acquired) {
090                    eLock = CacheAPIFactory.getLock(1, key);
091                }
092            }
093            else {
094                boolean eAdded;
095                synchronized (this) {
096                    eAdded = lockMap.containsKey(key);
097                    if (!eAdded) {
098                        Semaphore eSemaphore = new Semaphore(eConcurrentPermits,
099                            true);
100                        lockMap.put(key, eSemaphore);
101                        int eLockedPermissions = eSemaphore.drainPermits();
102                        eLock = CacheAPIFactory.getLock(eLockedPermissions, key);
103                    }
104                }
105                if (eAdded) {
106                    boolean acquired = lockMap.get(key).tryAcquire(1,
107                        getDefaultWaitTimeoutInMillisecond(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
108                    if (acquired) {
109                        eLock = CacheAPIFactory.getLock(1, key);
110                    }
111                }
112            }
113            if (eLock != null) {
114                threadLocks.put(Thread.currentThread(), eLock);
115            }
116            return eLock;
117        }
118    
119        public void release(Lock<KeyType> lock) {
120            if (lock == null) {
121                lock = getAttainedLockForCurrentThread();
122                if (lock == null) {
123                    return;
124                }
125            }
126            if (lockMap.containsKey(lock.getKey())) {
127                KeyType eKey = lock.getKey();
128                Semaphore eSemaphore = lockMap.get(eKey);
129                int ePermissions = lock.getNumberOfPermissionsAttained();
130                eSemaphore.release(ePermissions);
131            }
132        }
133    
134        public void setDefaultWaitTimeoutInMillisecond(long defaultWait) {
135            defaultWaitInMillisecond = defaultWait;
136        }
137    
138        public long getDefaultWaitTimeoutInMillisecond() {
139            return defaultWaitInMillisecond;
140        }
141    
142        public Lock<KeyType> getAttainedLockForCurrentThread() {
143            return threadLocks.get(Thread.currentThread());
144        }
145    
146        public void expire(KeyType key) {
147            lockMap.remove(key);
148        }
149    
150        public void setExpiryPeriod(long durationInMillisecond) {
151            expirationDuration = durationInMillisecond;
152        }
153    
154        public long getExpiryPeriod() {
155            return expirationDuration;
156        }
157    
158        public void setExpiryPolicy(String policy) {
159            String newExpirationPolicy;
160            try {
161                ExpiryPolicy.valueOf(policy);
162                newExpirationPolicy = policy;
163            }
164            catch (IllegalArgumentException argumentException) {
165                newExpirationPolicy = ExpiryPolicy.SIMPLE_TIME_TRIGGERED_EXPIRATION.
166                    name();
167            }
168            synchronized (expiryPolicy) {
169                expiryPolicy = newExpirationPolicy;
170            }
171        }
172    
173        public String getExpiryPolicy() {
174            if (expiryPolicy == null) {
175                expiryPolicy = ExpiryPolicy.SIMPLE_TIME_TRIGGERED_EXPIRATION.name();
176            }
177            return expiryPolicy;
178        }
179    
180        protected void initExpirationExecutor() {
181            if (timer != null) {
182                timer.cancel();
183            }
184            timer = new Timer();
185            timer.schedule(new ExpireExecutor(), expirationDuration,
186                expirationDuration / 4);
187        }
188    
189        private class IdleTimeMapMonitor
190            implements MapMonitor<KeyType, Semaphore> {
191    
192            public void notifyPut(KeyType key,
193                                  Semaphore value) {
194                idleDuration.put(key, System.currentTimeMillis());
195            }
196    
197            public void notifyGet(Object key) {
198                if (ExpiryPolicy.IDLE_FOR_DURATION.name().equals(expirationPolicy.
199                    get(key))) {
200                    idleDuration.put((KeyType) key, System.currentTimeMillis());
201                }
202            }
203    
204            public void notifyPutAll(
205                Map<? extends KeyType, ? extends Semaphore> values) {
206                throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
207            }
208    
209            public void notifyRemove(Object key) {
210                idleDuration.remove(key);
211                expirationPolicy.remove(key);
212            }
213        }
214    
215        private class ExpireExecutor
216            extends TimerTask
217            implements Runnable {
218    
219            public void run() {
220                Set<Map.Entry<KeyType, Long>> entries = idleDuration.entrySet();
221                for (Map.Entry<KeyType, Long> entry : entries) {
222                    if ((System.currentTimeMillis() -
223                        entry.getValue().longValue()) >=
224                        getExpiryPeriod()) {
225                        expire(entry.getKey());
226                    }
227                }
228            }
229        }
230    }
